level.heading: Applicability.
level.text: This subchapter shall only apply to a covered loan as defined in ยง 26-1151.01(7)(A).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see ยง 201 of Home Loan Protection Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-295, March 1, 2002, 49 DCR 2534).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-132
level.text: For Law 14-132, see notes following ยง 26-1151.01.
